column4: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.

column2: 23. Your red traffic signal changes to green while a pedestrian is crossing in your traffic lane. The right of way should be given:

26. Drivers should make room for cars entering freeways by:
column6: moving over a lane if there is no other vehicle next to them.

column2: 28. You hear a siren close by but can not see where the emergency vehicle is. What do you do?
column4: Keep driving until you are sure the emergency vehicle is headed toward you.
column6: Stop immediately and activate your emergency flashers.
column8: Pull over to the right side of the road and stop until you are sure the emergency vehicle is not headed toward you.
